title: Domme for Hire
description: Ever been stuck between two identities?One you feel comfortable in, like it is the person you are truly meant to be.The other… well you are living a lie.Hi. I’m Mandy and my life is a giant lie.Stuck between the man I married after high school and the laundry list of clients who pay me for my time. My husband knows what I do for a living yet doesn’t seem to care.My clients have no idea I am a married woman. Dominating them for my own kicks.Personal gratification.Sexual submission.Kink I can’t control.My name is Mandy Frank and I am a female Domme.
author: Dawn  Robertson
